name: The song of Nastaliq
description:
Iranian calligraphy is one of the historical arts of Iran and an example of good Iranian culture.
Nastaliq is the main line of the Persian writing tradition after the Sassanids and is equally important in areas affected by its culture.
Letter (ر)
(ر) is the 12th letter of the Persian alphabet. Calligraphy is like a bird. Therefore, in this work of art, I have combined one of the Persian letters (ر) with the shape of a bird, inspired by nature.
